item.title: No Pander: Romney Makes Free Enterprise Pitch to Black Americans
item.description: No Pander: Romney Makes Free Enterprise Pitch to Black Americans http://t.co/tNDaNnJD
item.content:encoded: No Pander: Romney Makes Free Enterprise Pitch to Black Americans http://t.co/tNDaNnJD Republican presidential contender Mitt Romney told the NAACP annual conference this morning: "I’ve never heard anyone look around an impoverished neighborhood and say, 'You know, there’s too much free enterprise around here. Too many shops, too many jobs, too many people putting money in the bank.'" He's wrong there-formr Washington, DC mayor Marion Barry said that earlier this year--but Romney hit the right notes in pitching black voters on a common commitment to free enterprise, reaching past the big-government politics of the bulk of the NAACP's leadership to connect directly with the aspirations of millions of Americans, black and white. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.content:encoded: UN arms treaty could put U.S. gun owners in foreign sights, say critics | Fox News http://t.co/PiejT5CU A treaty being hammered out this month at the United Nations could expose the records of U.S. gun owners and restrict Washington's ability to help allies like Israel and Taiwan, despite a near global chorus singing the praises of the world body’s effort. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: foxnews.com

item.title: Here's Patriots Owner Bob Kraft Helping His Girlfriend With Some Kind Of Weird Audition
item.description: Here's Patriots Owner Bob Kraft Helping His Girlfriend With Some Kind Of Weird Audition [Video]: ... http://t.co/oJyXrBYL
item.content:encoded: Here's Patriots Owner Bob Kraft Helping His Girlfriend With Some Kind Of Weird Audition [Video]: ... http://t.co/oJyXrBYL Well, this isn't something we ever thought we'd see. It's 32-year-old occasional actress Ricki Noel Lander, better known around Boston as the close "pal" of Patriots owner Robert Kraft, and she appears to auditioning for the role of "Mary Elena" in something that requires her to be in a bikini. So far, so normal. Then, before we get anywhere in the audition process, out pops (you guessed it!) Bob Kraft to lend some assistance running lines. There's dancing, horrendous acting, even Kraft fake-punching some dude and uttering the words "Fuck you, pussy!" Oscar-worthy stuff, really. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: deadspin.com

item.title: Holder Speaks Strong Words On Voter ID
item.description: Voter ID laws: "We call those poll taxes" -Eric Holder http://t.co/9rMmVU4c
item.content:encoded: Voter ID laws: "We call those poll taxes" -Eric Holder http://t.co/9rMmVU4c HOUSTON -- Attorney General Eric Holder said Tuesday he opposes a new photo ID requirement in Texas elections because it would be harmful to minority voters. In remarks to the NAACP in Houston, the attorney general said the Justice Department "will not allow political pretexts to disenfranchise American citizens of their most precious right." Link - Trackbacks
